Metadata.title: Orange County Appliance Repair | AC, Refrigerator, Washer & Dishwasher Service
Metadata.description: Professional appliance repair in Orange County. AC, refrigerator, washer, and dishwasher repair and installation. $50 service call, waived if you approve the quote.

Hero.title: Professional Appliance Repair Services
Hero.subtitle: Serving Orange County with fast, reliable appliance repair and installation.
Hero.imageAlt: Professional technician repairing an air conditioner

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Comprehensive appliance repair and installation services

items.title: Air Conditioning Repair & Installation
items.description: Professional AC repair, installation, and maintenance. We handle central and split systems of all brands.

items.title: Refrigerator Repair
items.description: Fast diagnosis and fixes for cooling issues, leaks, noise, and more.

items.title: Washer Repair
items.description: Fixing common washer problems like draining, spinning, and leaks.

items.title: Dishwasher Installation & Repair
items.description: Professional dishwasher installation and repair to keep your unit running right.

Pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees, clear pricing
visitFeeFeatures: On-site diagnosis by a professional technician
Pricing.footnote: * The service call fee covers diagnosis and assessment. If you approve our repair quote, the fee is waived.
